newsitem.title: JORDAN: Jordan o/n rates edge higher in a 3.00-4.00 pct range.
newsitem.headline: Jordan o/n rates edge higher in a 3.00-4.00 pct range.

text.p: Jordan overnight dinar rates rose slightly on Tuesday in a 3.00-4.00 percent range with enough excess liquidity to continue to keep rates relatively low, dealers said.

Bankers attribute the softer market this week to start of monthly salary transfers by ministries and public institutions to the banking system along with weaker subscription in last week's 15 million dinar certificate of deposit (CD) auction.
Rates hovered in a 3.00-3.50 pct range on Monday.
